related_post.text: anyone know how to make it pythonvlc send a signal when the media player is done playing

so_post.text: @Deleted User `pythonvlc media player is done playing` gives me <https://stackoverflow.com/questions/49141463/howtowaituntilasoundfileendsinvlcinpython36> which suggests `get_state()`.

comments: Nilsa asks question and Xinping finds answer on SO post
